Control Name: SA-19 (2) CONFIGURATION CONTROL FOR COMPONENT SERVICE / REPAIR
Control Statement: The organization maintains configuration control over [Assignment: organization-defined information system components] awaiting service/repair and serviced/repaired components awaiting return to service.
